# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This is a special opportunity for you to acquire such a high-quality item at a reduced cost. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
